mapper.select: select tab_domain.id,tab_domain.domain,tab_domain.state,tab_domain.service_type_id from tab_domain_in_use left join tab_domain on tab_domain_in_use.domain_id=tab_domain.id where service_type_id=#{serviceTypeId}

select tab_domain_in_use.id,tab_domain_in_use.wx_appid,tab_domain_in_use.wx_name,tab_domain.domain,tab_domain.state,tab_domain.service_type_id from tab_domain_in_use left join tab_domain on tab_domain_in_use.domain_id=tab_domain.id
SELECT tab_domain.domain FROM tab_domain_in_use LEFT JOIN tab_domain ON tab_domain_in_use.domain_id=tab_domain.id WHERE tab_domain.service_type_id=#{serviceTypeId}
